A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Probably the most disappointing movie I have ever seen. Not only did this film waste our time with a useless Finn subplot; but it also did not deliver on any of the setups of the Force Awakens\, and most devastatingly destroyed the integrity of Luke Skywalker. We waited two and a half years to find out that the legendary Luke Skywalker had become a murderous coward. BOOOOOO Rian Johnson and shame on you for ruining the legacy of the original trilogy. NOT MY STAR WARS MOVIE!
